name: Acro Mode
description:
Acro Mode is a Freestyle FPV Drone Simulator created to give you the ability to have a quick freestyle session from the comfort of your Meta Quest or Quest 2. 

Perform barrel rolls, dives and orbits without losing your lunch via the customizable FPV Goggle simulation display. The drone's perspective information is relayed to a 2D display attached to your face! Just like the Pros!

Acro Mode is still in development, depending on interest more maps and features are a possibility!

Current Features:

- Day and Night Environments

- Customizable FPV Display

- Customizable Control Rate Settings

- 90 FPS on Quest 2 

- Stabilized Clip Recording because the screen is attached to your head!

- Multiplayer Sessions w/Voice Chat

- Watch other players feeds in Multiplayer Sessions

- Drone Tag! (Experimental)

Beta Test Available via Oculus App Lab 

Not knowing what is up with apk sharing while in the app lab, I'll have to add you manually to the beta list please PM me on Itch to get access.
